mapper.select:
select PRO_NUM, CG_CODE, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DISCOUNT, PRO_PUBLISHER, PRO_CONTENT, PRO_UP_FOLDER, PRO_IMG, PRO_AMOUNT, PRO_BUY, PRO_DATE, PRO_UPDATEDATE from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT_TBL pk_pro_num) */ rownum rn, PRO_NUM, CG_CODE, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DISCOUNT, PRO_PUBLISHER, PRO_CONTENT, PRO_UP_FOLDER, PRO_IMG, PRO_AMOUNT, PRO_BUY, PRO_DATE, PRO_UPDATEDATE from PRODUCT_TBL where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from PRODUCT_TBL where

mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_TBL SET PRO_PRICE = #{pro_price}, PRO_BUY = #{pro_buy} WHERE PRO_NUM = #{pro_num}

update.foreach: UPDATE PRODUCT_TBL SET PRO_PRICE = #{item.pro_price}, PRO_BUY = #{item.pro_buy} WHERE PRO_NUM = #{item.pro_num}
